alert.note: Alert for Bienville; Jackson; Lincoln; Natchitoches; Ouachita; Winn (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued January 02 at 6:33PM CST until January 02 at 8:15PM CST by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM CST THIS EVENING FOR JACKSON, SOUTHERN LINCOLN, SOUTHWESTERN OUACHITA, NORTHWESTERN WINN, SOUTHEASTERN BIENVILLE AND NORTH CENTRAL NATCHITOCHES PARISHES... At 633 PM CST, local law enforcement reported thunderstorms producing heavy rain in Jonesboro and Hodge. Between 6 and 7 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is already occurring. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Law enforcement reported. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Ruston, Grambling, Jonesboro, Choudrant, Simsboro, Hodge, Goldonna, North Hodge, Vienna, Dodson, East Hodge, Saline, Quitman, Eros, Mount Olive, Liberty Hill and Friendship. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.

area.areaDesc: Bienville; Jackson; Lincoln; Natchitoches; Ouachita; Winn
